bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium aluminum, smooth weld fully manipulated tubing, semi-compact Freeroad design, internal cable routing, rack and fender fittings, integrated headset

1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer with 20mm of spacers

Specialized CX Comp 6061 alloy, short drop
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
Forged alloy Hub, sealed bearings, 32 hole, for J bend round spokes
Forged aluminum, 32h, double sealed ball bearings, cassette, QR
Specialized Borough CX Sport, 700x32c, wire bead, 60TPI
Specialized Borough CX Sport, 700x32c, wire bead, 60TPI
Body Geometry Riva Road, w/ steel rails
Specialized Elite, carbon wrapped alloy, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
